column4: ok, I had the Linksys WUSB54G usb device working for a few (Ubuntu ver 6.06), then rebooted.  Not working now.  Any thoughts?
try the LiveCD from different distro and different version.
Distribution from others, like Ubuntu, Fedora, Debian, Mandriva, etc.
Because the LiveCD will not change anything. You can use it for a diagnostic to see if it is hardware issue, or kernel support/driver issues, etc.
